auriga_run_board_encoder_motor_speed: [ICON]encoder motor [PORT] [ROTATE] rotates at speed of [POWER] r/min
auriga_run_board_encoder_motor_pos: [ICON]encoder motor [PORT] [ROTATE] rotates by [DEGREE] degree at speed of[POWER] r/min
AURIGA_RUN_ENCODER_MOTOR_ROTATE_0: ตามเข็มนาฬิกา
AURIGA_RUN_ENCODER_MOTOR_ROTATE_1: ทวนเข็มนาฬิกา
auriga_run_encoder_motor: [ICON] encoder motor [PORT] [SLOT] [ROTATE] rotates by [DEGREE] degree at speed of [POWER] r/min
auriga_run_stepper_motor_pos: [ICON] stepping motor [PORT] [ROTATE] rotates with a distance of [DISTANCE] steps,at speed of [POWER] stp/min
auriga_run_servo: [ICON] Servo [PORT] [SLOT] อยู่ที่ตำแหน่ง [DEGREE] องศา
AURIGA_RUN_FAN_FAN_ROTATE_0: ตามเข็มนาฬิกา
AURIGA_RUN_FAN_FAN_ROTATE_1: ทวนเข็มนาฬิกา
auriga_run_smart_servo_to_zero: [ICON] สมาร์ทเซอร์โว [INDEX] หมุนกลับไปที่ตำแหน่งเริ่มต้น
auriga_run_smart_servo_absolute: [ICON]smart servo [INDEX] [ROTATE] rotates to [POSITION] degree at speed of [POWER]r/min
auriga_run_smart_servo_to_relative: [ICON]smart servo [INDEX] [ROTATE] rotates by [DEGREE] degree at speed of [POWER]r/min
auriga_show_face_position: [ICON] LED panel [PORT] shows image [FACE_PANEL] at x: [X] y: [Y]
auriga_show_text_position: [ICON] LED panel[PORT] shows text [TEXT] at x: [X] y: [Y]
auriga_show_external_led_time: [ICON]RGB LED [PORT]  lights up[LED_POSTION] with color [COLOR] for [TIME] secs
auriga_show_external_led_rgb: [ICON] RGB LED [PORT]  lights up [LED_POSTION] with color red [R] green[G] blue [B]
auriga_show_all_ledstrip_color: [ICON]LED strip [PORT] [SLOT] all lights up with color [COLOR_LIST]
auriga_show_ledstrip_rbg: [ICON] LED strip [PORT] [SLOT] [POS] lights up with color red [R] green [G] blue [B]
auriga_detect_external_linefollower: [ICON] [ICON]เซ็นเซอร์เดินตามเส้น [PORT] ตรวจพบ [LINEFOLLOW_STATE] สี [BLACK_WHITE] ？ [PORT]  value
auriga_event_external_linefollower: [ICON] [ICON]เซ็นเซอร์เดินตามเส้น [PORT] ตรวจพบ [LINEFOLLOW_STATE] สี [BLACK_WHITE] ？[PORT] detects [LINEFOLLOW_STATE] being [BLACK_WHITE] ？
auriga_detect_compass: [ICON] เข็มทิศอิเล็กทรอนิกส์ [PORT] ชี้ไปทางเหนือ
auriga_detect_flame: [ICON] เซ็นเซอร์เปลวไฟ [PORT] ค่า
auriga_event_pir_motion: [ICON] เซ็นเซอร์ PIR [PORT] ตรวจพบการเคลื่อนไหวของมนุษย์?
auriga_detect_potentiometer: [ICON]ตัวต้านทานปรับค่าได้ พอร์ต [PORT] value

AURIGA_ENCODER_MOTOR_V2_MOTOR_SLOT_1: มอเตอร์ พอร์ต2

auriga_encoder_motor_V2_pos: [ICON] set encoder motor V2 DIP switch [SWITCH] [SLOT]to rotate by [DEGREE]degrees at speed of [SPEED]r/min
auriga_run_smart_servo_rgb: [ICON] set smart servo [INDEX] LED red [R] green [G] blue [B]
